titlealts.searchtitle: Supporting Information: Reciprocal Healthcare Agreement - Description

div.p: The United Kingdom has Reciprocal Healthcare Agreements with a number of non- European Economic Area (EEA) countries and territories.
If a PERSON from a country with a Reciprocal Healthcare Agreement needs urgent or immediate medical treatment, it will be provided at a reduced cost or, in some cases, free.
For further information and the list of countries that have Reciprocal Healthcare Agreements with the United Kingdom, see the NHS website at: Travelling outside the European Economic Area (EEA).
